LanguageData.XmlExtensions_ShowSettingsButton: Add "+" button to open the XML Extensions mod settings menu?
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_ShowSettingsButtonTip: If enabled, a small "+" button will appear next to the vanilla Mod options button which will quickly open this alternate mod settings menu
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_NoExtraSettings: No extra settings at the moment
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_ConfirmationResetMod: Are you sure you want to delete every unused key of the current mod?
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_ConfirmResetAll: Are you sure you want to delete all unused keys from every mod?
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_HowToPin: Right-click a mod to pin it
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_AddMainButton: Add a main button for opening the XML Extensions mod settings menu?
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_AddMainButtonTip: Adds a main button that opens this alternate mod settings menu
